messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Anyone recommend any websites for getting penpals for kids?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/30/03 8:10:31 PM, ikonstitcher@cox.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/30/03 8:10:31 PM, ikonstitcher@... writes:

<< http://www.gomilpitas.com/homeschooling/

<<(An excellent site, no matter what the homeschooling topic.) >>

She used to (might still) have an anti-unschooling article up, under
unschooling.
When I objected, she said she wanted to have a balanced presentation, but I
also had the impression she hadn't really read it, just linked it. :-/

But there IS a ton of stuff there.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Anyone recommend any websites for	getting penpals for kids?

> HI! Thanks for the site... do you have the actually address of the
> site? I wasnt able to pull anything up?

http://www.gomilpitas.com/homeschooling/

(An excellent site, no matter what the homeschooling topic.)

Nancy

he takes up a pen to write.

> Hi, there is a website for homeschooler's that has a pen pal page.

for home schooled kids of all ages. Good luck.

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Anyone recommend any websites for getting penpals for kids?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, there is a website for homeschooler s that has a pen pal page.  The website is - A to Z Home s Cool.  They offer an array of things for home schooled kids
messages.messageBody:
Hi, there is a website for homeschooler's that has a pen pal page. The website is - A to Z Home's Cool. They offer an array of things for home schooled kids of all ages. Good luck.

Kate
----- Original Message -----
From: cshagedorn
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, November 29, 2003 10:23 PM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Anyone recommend any websites for getting penpals for kids?


Hi everyone! I was wondering if any of you knew of any websites for
getting penpals that are good (and SAFE) for kids. We want just a
few from other countries. When I did a search engine.. "Penpals for
children".... ya know what came up?.... penpals with prisoners...
(top three) and then... a child murder or lost child.... how
freakishly weird is that?.. anyway... anyone able to help... my
daughter is only 7 thanks!

Cynthia

messages.subject: Anyone recommend any websites for getting penpals for kids?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone!  I was wondering if any of you knew of any websites for getting penpals that are good (and SAFE) for kids.  We want just a few from other
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone! I was wondering if any of you knew of any websites for
getting penpals that are good (and SAFE) for kids. We want just a
few from other countries. When I did a search engine.. "Penpals for
children".... ya know what came up?.... penpals with prisoners...
(top three) and then... a child murder or lost child.... how
freakishly weird is that?.. anyway... anyone able to help... my
daughter is only 7 thanks!

Cynthia
